descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Julius Randle and Reggie Bullock combine to drain 3-pointers on three straight possessions.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle, Bullock go back-to-back-to-back from downtown) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle, Bullock go back-to-back-to-back from downtown

videos.description: Mike Breen gets a standing ovation from Madison Square Garden for receiving the 2020 Curt Gowdy Electronic Media Award.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mike Breen recognized for HOF honor) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mike Breen recognized for HOF honor

videos.description: Julius Randle gives it to RJ Barrett, who muscles his way along the baseline for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barrett attacks baseline for layup) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barrett attacks baseline for layup

videos.description: RJ Barrett flies to the bucket and through multiple defenders for an and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barrett drives through traffic for and-1) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barrett drives through traffic for and-1

videos.description: RJ Barrett maneuvers his way around a defender along the baseline for an and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Barrett stays hot with another and-1) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Barrett stays hot with another and-1

videos.description: Tremont Waters drains a step-back 3-pointer and on the next possession, Romeo Langford gets to the bucket for a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Waters, Langford keeping Celtics close) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Waters, Langford keeping Celtics close

videos.description: After a steal, Tremont Wasters passes ahead to Carsen Edwards, who gets to the rim for a one-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Edwards breaks away for Celtics dunk) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Edwards breaks away for Celtics dunk
